Literature.Title: A Synthetic Derivative of Antimicrobial Peptide Holothuroidin 2 from Mediterranean Sea Cucumber (Holothuria tubulosa) in the Control of Listeria monocytogenes.
Literature.Author: Cusimano MG, Spinello A, Barone G, Schillaci D, Cascioferro S, Magistrato A, Parrino B, Arizza V, Vitale M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19114(MIC=2500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19114(MIC=2500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=2500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=1200µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 7644(MIC=2500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 7644(MIC=2500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes NCTC 18890(MIC=5000µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes NCTC 18890(MIC=5000µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=1200-2500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=2500µg/ml)
